Articles.Content:
One more thing: I don't know if this is true for other versions, but for the 1.4 version of SpaceY Extended, the SYvernier1 vernier thrusters have the thruster plume coming out the back of the thruster, through the body of whatever they're attached to.  It's just a visual glitch, they still actually thrust in the correct direction.

Linuxgurugamer has written a patch for it, which you can find here.
